movies.title: The Final Countdown
movies.plot: During routine manoeuvres near Hawaii in 1980, the aircraft-carrier USS Nimitz is caught in a strange vortex-like storm, throwing the ship back in time to 1941â€”mere hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

events.title: the USS Nimitz is sent back to the day before Pearl Harbor
